rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Small foyer with built-in seating and decorative elements reflecting Bohemian style.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering natural light and scenic views; features eclectic Bohemian decor.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, open-plan kitchen integrated with dining space; designed for family use with ample counter space and storage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Larger bedroom with en-suite bathroom, Vastu compliant placement towards the north-east to enhance prosperity and health.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom for guests; designed with a private balcony facing south-east to ensure positivity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the living area, ideal for family meals and gatherings.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: Functional storage area; located near kitchen with provisions for laundry or utility access.

openings.description: Balconies integrated in living room and guest bedroom windows for enhanced natural ventilation.
